snippet.title: Death Trick: Double Blind Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Death Trick: Double Blind demo is available during LudoNarraCon on Steam!

The star magician of the circus went missing: rumors are flying, trouble is brewing, but the show must go on. Death Trick: Double Blind is a non-linear detective game. Gather clues, question suspects, and point out contradictions to unravel the mystery from two alternating perspectives.
